revision.comment: header correction: variations on "Related terms"; [[WT:NORM|normalize]] if necessary (via JWB)
revision.text: ==Hadza== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hts|/ʔiamuʔa/}} ===Noun=== {{hts-noun|g=m}} # matter, concern ===Etymology=== * Cushitic. Cf. Iraqw ''[[yaamu]]'' 'earth, ground, world' ===Related terms=== * [[yamuako]] * [[yamuabee]]
